message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to me.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our potential partnership, $12,500 is unfortunately below my minimum selling price.  I'm willing to go down to $13,500 to make this deal work.  Let me know if this is acceptable.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000. This is my final offer, let me know if you're willing to accept.
